TopicTitle: Hey YouTubers, what tool do you use to fix corrupted video files?

Articles.Content:
yeah, so I have had the problem that KSP crashes and BandiCam (the tool I use to record my gaming) cannot correctly finish the recording. The MP4 gets corrupted and I can't edit it (using Windows Movie Maker for lack of anything else. Got suggestions for something better?).

Have you encountered this problem? What do you use to fix broken video files? I tested a few tools but they are not really sufficient.

Any help would be appreciated!
